name: US Military Tank Mechanic Garage – Repair Workshop
name_original: US Military Tank Mechanic Garage – Repair Workshop
description:
Do you have the ability to the best US Army Tank mechanic with the perfect repairing skill? The answer would be yes then the Tank Mechanic Workshop Garage gives you the chance to get hands on experience in tank repairing in your own fixing workshop with the amazing state of the art mechanical tools and equipment. Till now there are lot of tanks and cars which have been repaired in the tank mechanic workshop such as limo robot car, offroad car, sports car, hummer cars and army tanks. Fixing, modifying, customization have never been so interesting before, so jump in to the repair shop, pick up the upgraded mechanical tools, start repairing rusty tank so that they can join the great tank battle field and able to win the war of tanks.

There are lot of different tasks which you have perform in this tank mechanic workshop game like tank engine repairing, tank wheel repairing, tank paint job, denting, charge the battery, scan it to reconnect the wires, and light fixing using numerous tank repair sim toolkit and equipment. The interesting and challenging thing is to complete every task and level in a given time. This repairing simulator game is a striking introduction to workshop games, it will enhance your understanding of tank games while you learn to become an expert tank mechanic, deeply inspect tank simulator to find out defects in this vertex of tank games. So what are you waiting for? Grab the finest of tank games with an amazing experience of being tank fixer and become the guru of all mechanic in the little big city.

Game Features:
» Tight the tank’s nuts and bolts with screwdriver
» Lots of mechanical tools and equipments
» Easy to learn, intuitive touch screen controls
» Put the oil in the tank engine to make it perform its vital function.
» Realistic army tanks repairing workshop
» Excellent sound effects
